widgets.title: Scan Recency Analysis
widgets.description: Distribution of recent vs older Inspector scans for compliance monitoring

queries.name: Recent Scans
queries.query: FIND aws_inspector_assessment with status='COMPLETED' AS assessment WHERE assessment.completedOn > date.now-90day RETURN 'Recent (0-90 days)' AS x, count(assessment) AS y

queries.name: Older Scans
queries.query: FIND aws_inspector_assessment with status='COMPLETED' AS assessment WHERE assessment.completedOn < date.now-90day RETURN 'Older (90+ days)' AS x, count(assessment) AS y

widgets.title: Total Instances Scanned
widgets.description: Total count of AWS instances with Inspector assessments for compliance evidence

queries.name: Query 1
queries.query: FIND aws_inspector_assessment with status='COMPLETED' AS assessment RETURN count(assessment) AS value

widgets.title: Inspector Scan Status Distribution
widgets.description: Distribution of Inspector assessment statuses for compliance tracking

queries.name: Query 1
queries.query: FIND aws_inspector_assessment AS assessment RETURN assessment.status AS name, count(assessment) AS value

widgets.title: Compliance Summary
widgets.description: Key metrics for ISO compliance evidence collection

queries.name: Recent Activity
queries.query: FIND aws_inspector_assessment with status='COMPLETED' AS assessment WHERE assessment.completedOn > date.now-30day RETURN 'Scans completed in last 30 days' AS 'Metric', count(assessment) AS 'Count'

widgets.title: Inspector Assessment Details for Compliance Evidence
widgets.description: Detailed table of Inspector assessments with timestamps for ISO compliance documentation

queries.name: Query 1
queries.query: FIND aws_inspector_assessment with status='COMPLETED' AS assessment RETURN assessment.displayName AS 'Assessment Name', assessment.completedOn AS 'Last Scan Completed', assessment.startedOn AS 'Scan Started', assessment.status AS 'Status', assessment.arn AS 'ARN' ORDER BY assessment.completedOn DESC LIMIT 50
